humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is 1.1 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma in the right breast measures 1.1 cm, which falls under T1 classification (T1: Tumor size ≤ 2 cm) according to the TNM staging system for cancer. The specific T stage is T1c, as stated in the synoptic report. T1c indicates that the tumor size is between 1.1 cm and 2 cm.
